name: Paella
description: A rice dish with rich flavors, often cooked with seafood, meat (usually chicken and rabbit), green beans, bell peppers, and spices.

name: Pulpo a la Gallega
description: Boiled octopus served with potatoes, olive oil, and hot paprika.
